Hi I am Geoatlas web assistant how can i help you today
Ciao! Sono Geoatlas, l'assistente web di monitoraggio geotecnico. Come posso aiutarti?

navigation.answer: You can navigate using the left sidebar menu. Click on different sections like Dashboard, Monitoring, Reports, and Settings.
The dashboard is accessible from the main menu on the left side.
Use the left sidebar menu to navigate the website.

configuration.answer: Click on 'Settings' in the left menu, then select 'Configuration' tab.

geotechnical.answer: Geotechnical monitoring involves continuous measurement of soil and rock properties to ensure structural stability and safety.
Settlement monitoring measures the vertical displacement of structures over time.
